name: Equimorphium
description:
Manage to keep the balance between two worlds controlling both characters at the same time. Sometimes you'll have to tip the balance to one side or the other to be able to continue, but be careful! It's dangerous to go alone...

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD -> Move left character

Arrow Keys -> Move right character

Xbox gamepad:

Left joystick -> Move left character

Right joystick ->Move right character

B button -> Accept

PS4 gamepad:

Left joystick -> Move left character

Right joystick ->Move right character

X button -> Accept

Please enjoy our game!
